titleStmt.title: An essay concerning nutrition in animals proving it analogical to that of plants, and discovering the like structure and use of the organs to be alike in both, with many observations towards the practise of physick : together by Philip Guide ...

titleStmt.title: An essay concerning nutrition in animals proving it analogical to that of plants, and discovering the like structure and use of the organs to be alike in both, with many observations towards the practise of physick : together by Philip Guide ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by H. Rhodes ...,

notesStmt.note: Mainly a discourse on the nature of the soul.
Number one of a projected series; apparently no more published.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
